title.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN CONTINUE TO RIDING AN ELEPHANTS FOR 30 MINUTES IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN CONTINUE TO RIDING AN ELEPHANTS FOR 30 MINUTES IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY AND THEN CONTINUE TO RIDING AN ELEPHANTS FOR 30 MINUTES IN BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages to try two famous activities in one day, first you will enjoy the water sports activity and then continue to riding an elephant in Bali islands. Is great combo adventure we created in to single tour packages by allowed you and your family to try our selection Water Sports activity such as : Banana Boat, Flying Fish, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands Tour in the best beach. You will assist by our professional Water Sports instructor. The Water sports and elephant ride tour more enjoyable with our Golden Bali Tour Driver by perform an excellent tour services with Private Car. After finish the adventure of water sports, we will directly go to elephant park, before ride the elephant you will enjoy the lunch buffet Indonesian food first, After lunch we will continue your adventure by give you opportunity to riding the biggest animal through the jungle and passed the local village to see the social activities life in this village in the top of the elephants with duration 30 minutes ride. After finish the elephant ride, we will drop you back to your hotel for take rest. This Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride tour packages is the perfect combination during your holiday in Bali islands. Make your holiday more impressive by choose this packages.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

price.title: Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,900,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,350,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,200,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,075,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Bali Water Sports Tour Packages :
    1. Flying Fish (2 Fly)
    2. Banana Boat (15 Minutes)
    3. Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands (60 Minutes)
  • 30 Minutes Elephant Ride
  • Professional Water Sports Tour and Elephant Ride Tour Guide
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Water Sports and Elephant Ride Tour Itinerary :

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
